name: The Lord Of Death
description:
! FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING !

! FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING !

! FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING !

This game contains flashing lights that may cause seizures to a small percentage of people.

Play the downloadable version if you want the full experience of the game.

A game questioning the meaning of death.

What does it mean to die in a game? Would you get any better? This game tells you a story of death, and what it feels like to die, and cause the death of others.

This game was created for the WOWIE JAM.

Made with the Godot Engine.

Hope you enjoy this game.
